package.name: AutoApollo2 (A12)
package.shortDescription: Open reddit links in Apollo without libOpener. Updated for arm64e/A12. Disclaimer: This has been tested minimally on an A12 device, and may or may not crash applications. Use at your own risk.

descriptionlist.description: Open reddit links in Apollo without libOpener. Updated for arm64e/A12. Disclaimer: This has been tested minimally on an A12 device, and may or may not crash applications. Use at your own risk.
